resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

say Navigation to navigate to the destination. 
 Say Read to read the messages. 
 Say Calculator to perform mathematical calculations. 
 Say time and date to know the time and date. 
 Say Battery to know the battery status. 
 Say Location to get the current location. 
 Say weather to read the weather details. 
 Say Object detection to detect the object. 
 Say Exit to close the application.

Visignify is a unique, user-centric platform that offers a transformative solution by revolutionizing how individuals with disabilities communicate, access information, and engage with the world. This app includes features such as object, sign detection using machine learning, OCR for text-to-speech functionality, voice output for location, battery, weather information, navigation with maps, learn feature, and a "Deaf Note" feature.
